content.txt1: Faggys da'n obbyr shoh obbraghyn cosoylagh rish obbraghyn ymmyrchagh, agh cha nee ry-cheilley rish cliaghtey, apps foshlit, etc. er dty phone, as t'eh myrgeddin ry-hoi ry-hoi ry-hoi ry-hoi ry-hoi ry-hoi ry-hoi ry-hoi ry-hoi ry-hoi ry-hoi. Son ta riskaghyn dy ve ry-chlashtyn, dy yannoo paidjys, as myr shen, ta shin cur stiagh dy glen dy vel oo er n’yannoo eh ny-lomarcan my t’ou tushtey dy kiaralagh y script.
content.txt2: Son y ghraih shoh: Ooilley ny page-thie jeh'n obbyr shoh, t'ou uss staydys y obbraghey y obbyr auxiliary ayns ny s'cosoylagh, ny t'ou uss geddyn rish y botoon 'sy thie. Ta'n botoon shoh forsaghey y ghleashtan dy ghleiy as dy ghleiy yn app shoh.
content.txt3: Yn aght ta shin uss uss y obbyr shoh, shegin dooin y ghraih y ghoaill dy foshlit applications elley as dy reill orroo, myr sampleyr tra ta'n instagram ry-brishey, t'eh ry-yannoo rish y video, cur-my-ner, ta'n produit er ny ghleiy, as t'eh cur teacht gys caraid er-line, as myr shen, ta'n obbyr shoh ry-yannoo rish y ghraih shoh.
content.iKnowDanger: Ta fys aym er ny risksyn - gow gys
content.title: Oobraghyn danjerey
